name: Ortharion project
description:
Ortharion project is an RPG hack'n slash in a fantastic medieval world.

Improve your character in many ways:

- Equipment with gems, several rarities of objects, specific powers for legendary pieces and set equipment.
- Find your spells among nearly 100 available. make them level up, rank up, improve their power with runes and find the best possible combinations.
- Specialize among several classes available with two great voices: Warrior or Mage.

Discover many quests with kosher goals.
Face powerful boss.

And take total control of your area!
